column2: not great. Pork ribs were a bit lean and chewy. Bbq sauce is vinegar base. Service was excellent
column3: really fast considering it was a packed house on a Saturday. Veggie bar had an assortment of fresh selection
column4: loved the pickle green onions. Price is a couple of dollars  more when considering the location.  Pics of sides looked great
column5: will have to try next time.
